TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
Btw did the songcookie have nuts because i'm allergic to digital nuts.The steam rage bots have taken California ,and occupying china ,and most of Eastern Russian.

Remember Odin's rule against this kind of stuff? All hail the Moderator!

Btw did the songcookie have nuts because i'm allergic to digital nuts.The steam rage bots have taken California ,and occupying china ,and most of Eastern Russian.

...What are their number designations.

(THERE IS A SUPER ANNOYING ICECREAM TRUCK DRIVING BY PLAYNG "WHEN THE SAINTS COME MARCHING IN")
there under the order of SPR-QE*D*W******* the others are part of a new written language i made up in geography a month ago.

(THERE IS A SUPER ANNOYING ICECREAM TRUCK DRIVING BY PLAYNG "WHEN THE SAINTS COME MARCHING IN")

Thank you, I now have that stuck in my head. To youtube with me~!

there under the order of SPR-QE*D*W******* the others are part of a new written language i made up in geography a month ago.

Blasphemy! Tell me their Number designations! is it 014 through 017 models?
Umm...I don't like number designation ,but if there are numbers on it i scratch it off then pace a Q ,or A
NEW TOPIC: What if we all lived on a Mars colony?

Umm...I don't like number designation ,but if there are numbers on it i scratch it off then pace a Q ,or A

*grasps MGUARN's throat* Tell. Me. Their. Numbers.
New topic anyone? About if we all lived on Mars? Anyone? Hello?
I'd be the weird girl in the labcoat who's always sipping coffee.

We'd all kinda be living underground, away from the radiation.

@Odin: Oh god yes.

NEW TOPIC: What if we all lived on a Mars colony?

Only if it was named Yellow Submarine, and all guests were greeted with Beetles songs.

We be taller.

TO rage:Umm......If i could remeber after all my harddrive skips out to much might be 1...2..3.......10 not sure.
Taller? Oh dear. I'd be some form of giant then. D:

We be taller.

TO rage:Umm......If i could remeber after all my harddrive skips out to much might be 1...2..3.......10 not sure.

...Lies. 001, 002, 003, all the way through 010 were melted down and used to create the legitimate first working R-series war mech. Rage014.
I'd be the guy obsessed with seals who drives rovers around.

we be sing "I was on mars one day..."

dear rage:Well there aren't war machines ,but machines that make an orderly chaos.Oh the how wonderful chaos is.Just there fearless tall figure creates chaos among them though they do you radioactive isotopes to heat the water.

we be sing "I was on mars one day..."

dear rage:Well there aren't war machines ,but machines that make an orderly chaos.Oh the how wonderful chaos is.Just there fearless tall figure creates chaos among them though they do you radioactive isotopes to heat the water.

*Starts banging MGUARN's Head against the nearest table* THE NUMBERS! The numbers Mason! What do they mean!?

O i got a good one we can make sand castles around the colony when we are kids.

Dear rage:*Dies due to mass amounts of data chips are destroyed when head has contacted the desk*

New episode of Skunky's comics up:

http://www.kerbalcomics.com/2013/06/04/episode-27-first-contact/

Sure is Star Trek around here lately.

...not that I'd mind having Scotty beam me up to a future in the engineering department of a starship. Could be a lot more exciting than a machine shop.

Big plus for "Dr. McCoy" line .

o i got a good one we can make sand castles around the colony when we are kids.

fffffffffrrrroaaaar!
Rage you know what will make you better is get a cup of the yellow liquid around you ,and drink it.I run on Apple cider strange? no?

Taller? Oh dear. I'd be some form of giant then. D:

How tall are you?

Not sure how we'd be taller on mars. We'd definately be lighter at least, since Mars gravity is less than earth gravity iirc.

Yah but we will also stretch since you really don't have that much gravity compressing you ,and not to mention you can be killed in one punch by a human that can from earth in less than 6 mins.(This hypothetical)
